website_summaries.verdict: A durable, comfortable bag with a convenient strap for a skateboard or jacket.
pros: Sternum strap and back  padding make this a comfortable backpack
Includes skateboard straps, which are convenient for other things, such as a jacket
Includes laptop and tablet sections in main compartment
cons: Front pockets flop down If the main compartment is open, which makes them inconvenient to access

customer_reviews.title: Best Backpack Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is awesome! I'm a teacher, so I need to carry a lot of little things. Here is what I can put in this thing all at once: Padded pocket - MacBook Air (13 inch) with case, iPad with case Small lines top pocket - Sunglasses Main pocket - Manila folder with several stack of papers to grade and other random stuff Top outer pocket - Post-its, pens, other office supplies Insulated bottom outer pocket - Wide-mouth mason jar Side pockets - 32 oz Hydroflask water bottle, 16 oz Hydroflask coffee bottle I always have everything it need, plus it looks pretty good. Not as trendy as a Herschel, but way better in terms of storage and actual usefulness.
customer_reviews.author: elle b

customer_reviews.title: Can fit 7 boxes of Girl Scout Cookies (& notebooks)
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome! I got a Northface Borealis backpack when I entered college but I find that the Dakine Duel 26L is much more funtional for me! I was able to fit 7 boxes of Girl Scout Cookies PLUS my notebooks, binder, folder, and planner in the main compartment. (with room left to spare!!) I’m the type of person that overpacks stuff for school, but with my Duel 26L I can overpack and still have a lot of room left. Also, I decided to get Stormy because it wasn’t cloth and I find that when it rains the backpack dries down faster than if it had cloth material on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! I needed something that could carry my laptop, some personal items, and my lunch. The backpack is very roomy and the laptop section is well padded. I would have preferred the insulated food pocket be a little larger or be on the bottom so food containers could be stored horizontally instead of vertically. But all and all I am very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Beth Stevic

customer_reviews.title: Dakine backpacks are the best
customer_reviews.text: I was having zipper issues with my previous Dakine backpack that I had for about 8 years, so I replaced it with this. I kind of just use the cooler pouch as a standard pocket, and it can be a bit annoying that the upper pouch will spill out if open, if you open the main zipper compartment, but otherwise great. 15" MSI laptop fits perfectly, where it was slightly big for my previous pack.
customer_reviews.author: A. MCCALL

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. I have been using heavily for months
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. I have been using heavily for months. Durable and nice color way. The 26L seems displaced given the sectored pockets. I have an open can style 26L bag that seems to hold a little more than this bag. Would still recommend though.
customer_reviews.author: D.R.

customer_reviews.title: great backpack
customer_reviews.text: solid bag, love dakine, they last forever. i wish the cooler pocket was just a bit bigger than it is. that is the only disappointment. laptop pocket is great (we do books and folders for younger kids) the main pocket hold snow gear in winter or camp stuff in summer. the top pocket is great for their little toys and pencils. love the sternum strap, thanks, too many bags overlook that! we bike/walk to school and its handy to have.
customer_reviews.author: A. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: The Backpack is starting to rip after only 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack in October, receiving it on October 6th. I had a Dakine backpack for many years & loved it. I put that backpack through a lot of use! It has only been 4 months and this new backpack is ripping at the shoulder strap. I am very disappointed. I will need a new backpack very soon and now will reconsider ever buying another Dakine.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie J. Keough

customer_reviews.title: Great for cycling commuting
customer_reviews.text: I got this backpack specifically for commuting on my bicycle especially for its organization. Other backpacks I had only had one large compartment which was not ideal when transporting slacks and a dress shirt. This takes care of that problem! I actually use the laptop pocket to put my neatly folded clothes which works great. Maybe not ideal if needing to take more than clothes, lunch and toiletries. Leave my shoes at work.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect urban day pack
customer_reviews.text: Perfect day pack, extremely comfortable, resistent, light and cool design. I was trying to find an EDC backpack where I could bring a sleeping over kit with my clothes + notebook + Food. It's perfect for urban assault and outdoor activities for weekends. I still have room for gadgets just in case. Really good backpack! Probably won't need to get a new one for the next 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo França

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is great. I use it for work
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is great. I use it for work. The insulated pouch is perfect for my lunch, and even holds an ice pack along with my sandwich and other items I eat. My laptop fits perfectly in the back, and my tablet on the pouch on the inside. Very comfortable to wear. If you dont have a skateboard through black velco straps are great for holding a jacket or sweater if the weather changes.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Buy for the bag not the cooler section
customer_reviews.text: Awesome backpack for work. The cooler part is not what I expected. I wanted to consolidate and remove the need to carry a lunch pal. I put two 16.9 water bottles and an ice pack in the cooler section and still have to bring my lunch pal. Still love the bag though.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Hansy

customer_reviews.title: Longest lasting zippers of any backpack I've had.
customer_reviews.text: My previous Dakine backpack outlasted all the others I had, combined. The zippers all failed what I consider to be prematurely on the others. My last Dakine lasted me 3.5 years. That's unheard of for my used of it. I thought bigger zippers where better. Not the case apparently.
customer_reviews.author: briccc4

customer_reviews.title: Built Like a Laptop Sleeve
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow. Very Inconvenient! Super disappointed. Looks nice and all but it's painfully narrow. Should be a $50 bag.
customer_reviews.author: Chaffed

customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack I purchased it for university last year it holds my laptop with whatever textbooks I need for the day plus notebooks, my planner, and an organizer. Bonus points for the insulated pocket in the front since I usually bring food. Best backpack I have owned. The front strap is very nice as well it helps even out the weight distribution.
customer_reviews.author: Dmpearldrummer

customer_reviews.title: A Must for Minimalists
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves this bag!! Shipping was fast, quality is excellent. For background, we are minimalists and the purpose of this bag was to replace my husbands lunch bag, gym back and old North Face backpack - an awesome bag that fullfills his 3-for-1 need - a minimalists dream!
customer_reviews.author: Jo L.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Its the perfect bag. Holds a skate very well. lots of room, great design. The only thing is that the fabric seems a little thin. That being said, Ive been careful with it and its held up well.
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this backpack for college
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this backpack for college! It has the perfect number of compartments to keep everything organized. The straps are padded and comfortable. I would definitely recommend this to anyone interested.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bethany Nilsen

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: This sturdy backpack is well worth the price. I carry my purse, uniform, laptop, books and snacks in the variety of pockets. It is one of the best investments that I have made.
customer_reviews.author: Mom on Target

customer_reviews.title: Smaller backpack
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize this bag didn't have much space on the inside. It doesn't have much give to expand so the room is limited. Great pockets to organize your stuff, nice laptop pocket but just isn't as spacious as I had hoped. Husband still uses it for work but we'll probably have to get a bigger backpack that can expand a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: DeanaT.

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack
customer_reviews.text: My husband was looking for a backpack and came across this one, loved its great light weight and padding area inside to carry his laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Best backpack I've ever had. It's sturdy and feels really nice and secure. It also has an interesting feature that makes a full backpack feel light
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: Its very well built, however the pouch for cold items could stand to be a little larger. It only holds about a sandwich and some string cheese if you put an ice pack in it.
customer_reviews.author: A.Clark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent backpack with great features
customer_reviews.text: Excellent backpack for the price. Perfect size and very well made. I love the insulated front pocket for carrying my yogurts into work. Water bottle/umbrella holders on the side are a nice feature as well. Perfect balance between and outdoor and traveling backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: This bag has lots of pockets!! Love the sunglasses pocket and the zippers have held up well at the beach with salt and sand.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect work backpack
customer_reviews.text: Perfect work backpack. Having the computer access in the back is the cat's meow.
customer_reviews.author: CanadianWinter

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother. He loves this bag Everything about it is nice.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get to experience it long, but it's sweet for sure!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this! Looks slick, quality build, pockets (including thermal) for all my things. Wore this to three client sites and got many compliments... then got held up in Oakland and that was that. Would buy again tho.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Larger than expected. My daughter quickly claimed this backpack as hers and I have not seen it since.
customer_reviews.author: My 2 cents...

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, durable
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Very durable. I get a lot of compliments on it. Only thing I would change is the glasses pocket on top. It is too shallow for my glasses or cell phone. Make the pocket a little bigger and the bag will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small sunglass pocket
customer_reviews.text: Too small. My vz clutch did not fit. everything else is fine!
customer_reviews.author: leojoachin

customer_reviews.title: Feels light and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Feels great and can fit a lot of stuff. Perfect fit for my 15.6” laptop.
customer_reviews.author: A. Delgadillo

customer_reviews.title: Precfect for college and HS students
customer_reviews.text: One if the best backpacks I bought. A lot of pockets and very good material used.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a fathers day gift for my boyfriend for his job since he works outside. He liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Shaylene

customer_reviews.title: Buy black bag
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag but obviously the cheaper light gray bag will get dirty right away when you strap a board on. Comfortable and well made. Organized big time. I'm a backpack guy, but this
customer_reviews.author: Danielle O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Perfect work backpack
customer_reviews.text: All the pockets and space you need for a day at work or a weekend of travel (with a carry on for clothes)
customer_reviews.author: Griffin Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack plenty of room and easy to wear for a long time. Straps in the front can be used for a bunch Of stuff
customer_reviews.author: Russell Rose

customer_reviews.title: Grrreat!
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I expected it to be. It looks great in person and seems really well made. The water bottle holders on the sides even do a great job securing my tall bottle that seems to fall out of all other backpacks. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: atabo

customer_reviews.title: The comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! It has multiple pockets for your laptop or tablets. I love the padding I can wear it for hours. And they have really cool designs!
customer_reviews.author: Payton

customer_reviews.title: Contents of the main pocket spill too easily
customer_reviews.text: The manner in which the upper pocket flips upside down and spills its contents all over the floor is unacceptable to me. See the video. Further, the top pocket has only one zipper pull--you can open it only from the left. The skateboard straps are useful only if you have a skateboard.
customer_reviews.author: John McGehee

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it - it is nothing like what the picture looks like.
customer_reviews.text: It’s garbage. What I received was not at all what it was online. Don’t waste your time buying it because you will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Well made and nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my high school son. He is extremely picky plus he thrashes all his backpacks - he loves it. Well made and nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: MX Racer 981

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! Best one I've ever purchased :)
customer_reviews.author: M.Johnston33

customer_reviews.title: Not the best travelling book bag though
customer_reviews.text: Just another Dakine backpack with no complaints at all. Not the best travelling book bag though...
customer_reviews.author: Jay Land

customer_reviews.title: great for my laptop and clothes
customer_reviews.text: I use this backpack on a daily basis. great for my laptop and clothes, durable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and hold a lot of stuff. May need to get a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing. It looks great and is super practical. My husband loves it.
customer_reviews.author: K M R

customer_reviews.title: Best Backpack
customer_reviews.text: The perfect Backpack. Really well made with a nice design..
customer_reviews.author: Tolo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband to replace his old Dakine backpack and he loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Went overseas with this bag and it was awesome. Perfect for laptop and extra clothes that I ...
customer_reviews.text: Went overseas with this bag and it was awesome. Perfect for laptop and extra clothes that I wasnted as a carryon.
customer_reviews.author: ABDUL A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I needed a very light backpack that could hold 11x17 booklets neatly. This does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek look, high quality materials.
customer_reviews.text: I like that the interior of the pockets are rubberized. Let's see how that stands up to rain or spills! The glasses pocket is small and useless for glasses you actually care about protecting; you can't fit even a small glasses case in their. But you can use the pocket for other stuff, obviously, and I keep my glasses in their case in the front pen pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Durable backpack and stylish too
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this backpack for my brother who is in 8th grade. His last backpack was also a dakine from over 5 years ago when i was a senior hahah. That just goes to show you that Dakine makes top quality backpacks. Seems to hold everything from his books, binder, ipad and other things. I would use this one if i had a need for it lol.
customer_reviews.author: RedEyedJedi

customer_reviews.title: Low-quality bag, grey instead of black, and can't actually carry a skateboard.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag, paying a premium so that I could carry my board. I am disappointed not only because the "black" is actually very grey, but because I can't even use this to carry a skateboard! The straps do not get close to tight enough. Will be returning this promptly. Also, the zippers were noisy. This is not a quality bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kadsl

product_meta.title: Dakine - Duel 26L Backpack - Padded Laptop & iPad Sleeve - Insulated Cooler Pocket - Mesh Side Pockets - 19" x 12" x 9"
product_meta.description:
Pack it all in the updated Duel backpack. The Duel features quick and easy loading in the main zippered compartment, plus a dedicated laptop sleeve to get from one class to the next in a hurry. With plenty of organization features, you'll never rummage around looking for your phone, pens or keys. Load your lunch and snacks in the dedicated cooler compartment strap, your skateboard or jacket into the external carry straps and you're ahead of the bell!

Care Instructions:
Adventures are messy. If your Dakine bag gets dirty, we recommend hand washing with mild soap (like Nikwax Tech Wash), cold water and a soft bristle brush. If hand washing is not going to do the trick, use a front loader washing machine. To ensure your backpack doesn't get tangled, place inside a pillowcase or mesh bag before washing. Always use cold water, mild soap and run on a gentle cycle. Never bleach your pack. Hang to dry in a warm but shady place, ensuring both inside and out are dry before storing.
feature_bullets: Modern backpack built around all your needs including a padded laptop sleeve that fits up to most 15" laptops and fleece lined padded tablet sleeve
Keep your lunch fresh in the insulated cooler pocket and for carrying comfort comes with skateboard carry straps and adjustable sternum strap
Functional organization complete with fleece lined sunglass pocket, an organizer pocket, and mesh side pockets | Price varies by fabric
Dakine offers a Limited Lifetime against manufacturing defects within the normal scope of use
